original_text: The next man said, “I have bought five pairs of oxen. So I am just going out to see if they work well together. Please say that I am sorry. Tell your master that I cannot come to his meal.”
korean_text: 또 한 사람은 이르되 나는 소 다섯 겨리를 샀으매 시험하러 가니 청컨대 나를 양해하도록 하라 하고

sentences.original_text: I have bought five pairs of oxen
So I am just going out
to see if they work well together
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 잘 함께 일하는지 보기 위해

sentences.original_text: Please say that I am sorry
that I cannot come to his meal
sentences.korean_translation: 제가 그의 식사에 갈 수 없다고
